title: Any chance of animated emotes in the future?
body:
I was excited for the new emotes and bought the bundle and one extra, but I'm a bit disappointed that there weren't any animated emotes. I totally get that animated emotes would cost more (as they should), and they could even be bundled with non-animated ones (1 animated and 3-4 normal).

Just some thoughts. Love the emotes so far, good job Riot!

replies.body:
Thanks for the feedback and glad you're enjoying Emotes!

We are actively exploring different versions of emotes that we could introduce and animations are a part of this exploration.

Let us know if you have any ideas for particular emotes or what you would like to see added in the future!
I mean, since you're asking for feedback... that Taric emote should have an actual hair flip happen. That's the only thing I've really wanted from emotes since they were announced.

> [{quoted}](name=Tim Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UHroO8P5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-12T17:56:43.611+0000)
>
> Thanks for the feedback and glad you're enjoying Emotes!
> 
> We are actively exploring different versions of emotes that we could introduce and animations are a part of this exploration.
> 
> Let us know if you have any ideas for particular emotes or what you would like to see added in the future!

I realize that a lot of people are complaining, about them not being available with IP/Blue essence. 

That got me thinking. Would it be possible to make these emotes available as loot drop for Hexcrafting?
Why the downvotes? Do people not like animated emotes?
Animated emotes, sure. 975 rp per in the future. xD

I'd like multiple emotes for single champs. I'm only using the vel koz one on vel koz "and it's awesome".

Add some MF emotes and i'll use them on my main
